<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Provides an Elastic Disaster Recovery replication configuration template resource. Before using DRS, your account must be [initialized](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/drs/latest/userguide/getting-started-initializing.html).

> **NOTE:** Your configuration must use the PIT policy shown in the basic configuration due to AWS rules. The only value that you can change is the `retention_duration` of `rule_id` 3.

## Example Usage

### Basic configuration

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = new aws.drs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplate("example", {
    associateDefaultSecurityGroup: false,
    bandwidthThrottling: 12,
    createPublicIp: false,
    dataPlaneRouting: "PRIVATE_IP",
    defaultLargeStagingDiskType: "GP2",
    ebsEncryption: "DEFAULT",
    ebsEncryptionKeyArn: "arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:111122223333:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab",
    replicationServerInstanceType: "t3.small",
    replicationServersSecurityGroupsIds: exampleAwsSecurityGroup.map(__item => __item.id),
    stagingAreaSubnetId: exampleAwsSubnet.id,
    useDedicatedReplicationServer: false,
    pitPolicies: [
        {
            enabled: true,
            interval: 10,
            retentionDuration: 60,
            units: "MINUTE",
            ruleId: 1,
        },
        {
            enabled: true,
            interval: 1,
            retentionDuration: 24,
            units: "HOUR",
            ruleId: 2,
        },
        {
            enabled: true,
            interval: 1,
            retentionDuration: 3,
            units: "DAY",
            ruleId: 3,
        },
    ],
});
```

```go
func main() {

for _, val0 := range exampleAwsSecurityGroup {
splat0 = append(splat0, val0.Id)
}
_, err := drs.NewReplicationConfigurationTemplate(ctx, "example", &drs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplateArgs{
AssociateDefaultSecurityGroup: pulumi.Bool(false),
BandwidthThrottling: pulumi.Int(12),
CreatePublicIp: pulumi.Bool(false),
DataPlaneRouting: pulumi.String("PRIVATE_IP"),

RetentionDuration: pulumi.Int(3),
Units: pulumi.String("DAY"),
RuleId: pulumi.Int(3),
},
},
})
if err != nil {

}
return nil
})
}
```

```csharp
return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var example = new Aws.Drs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplate("example", new()
    {
        AssociateDefaultSecurityGroup = false,
        BandwidthThrottling = 12,
        CreatePublicIp = false,
        DataPlaneRouting = "PRIVATE_IP",
        DefaultLargeStagingDiskType = "GP2",
        EbsEncryption = "DEFAULT",
        EbsEncryptionKeyArn = "arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:111122223333:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab",
        ReplicationServerInstanceType = "t3.small",
        ReplicationServersSecurityGroupsIds = exampleAwsSecurityGroup.Select(__item => __item.Id).ToList(),
        StagingAreaSubnetId = exampleAwsSubnet.Id,
        UseDedicatedReplicationServer = false,
        PitPolicies = new[]
        {
            new Aws.Drs.Inputs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplatePitPolicyArgs
            {
                Enabled = true,
                Interval = 10,
                RetentionDuration = 60,
                Units = "MINUTE",
```

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.aws.drs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplate;
import com.pulumi.aws.drs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplateArgs;
import com.pulumi.aws.drs.inputs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplatePitPolicyArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        var example = new ReplicationConfigurationTemplate("example", ReplicationConfigurationTemplateArgs.builder()
            .associateDefaultSecurityGroup(false)
            .bandwidthThrottling(12)
            .createPublicIp(false)
            .dataPlaneRouting("PRIVATE_IP")
            .defaultLargeStagingDiskType("GP2")
            .ebsEncryption("DEFAULT")
            .ebsEncryptionKeyArn("arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:111122223333:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab")
            .replicationServerInstanceType("t3.small")
            .replicationServersSecurityGroupsIds(exampleAwsSecurityGroup.stream().map(element -> element.id()).collect(toList()))
            .stagingAreaSubnetId(exampleAwsSubnet.id())
            .useDedicatedReplicationServer(false)
            .pitPolicies(            
                ReplicationConfigurationTemplatePitPolicyArgs.builder()
                    .enabled(true)
                    .interval(10)
                    .retentionDuration(60)
                    .units("MINUTE")
                    .ruleId(1)
                    .build(),
                ReplicationConfigurationTemplatePitPolicyArgs.builder()
                    .enabled(true)
                    .interval(1)
                    .retentionDuration(24)
                    .units("HOUR")
                    .ruleId(2)
                    .build(),
                ReplicationConfigurationTemplatePitPolicyArgs.builder()
                    .enabled(true)
                    .interval(1)
                    .retentionDuration(3)
                    .units("DAY")
                    .ruleId(3)
                    .build())
            .build());

    }
}
```

```csharp
var replicationConfigurationTemplateResource = new Aws.Drs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplate("replicationConfigurationTemplateResource", new()
{
    StagingAreaTags = 
    {
        { "string", "string" },
    },
    ReplicationServerInstanceType = "string",
    BandwidthThrottling = 0,
    CreatePublicIp = false,
    DataPlaneRouting = "string",
    DefaultLargeStagingDiskType = "string",
    UseDedicatedReplicationServer = false,
    EbsEncryption = "string",
    AssociateDefaultSecurityGroup = false,
    StagingAreaSubnetId = "string",
    ReplicationServersSecurityGroupsIds = new[]
    {
        "string",
    },
    EbsEncryptionKeyArn = "string",
    PitPolicies = new[]
    {
        new Aws.Drs.Inputs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplatePitPolicyArgs
        {
            Interval = 0,
            RetentionDuration = 0,
            Units = "string",
            Enabled = false,
            RuleId = 0,
        },
    },
    Tags = 
    {
        { "string", "string" },
    },
    Timeouts = new Aws.Drs.Inputs.ReplicationConfigurationTemplateTimeoutsArgs
    {
        Create = "string",
        Delete = "string",
        Update = "string",
    },
    AutoReplicateNewDisks = false,
});
```

## ReplicationConfigurationTemplate Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">
<p>
In Python, inputs that are objects can be passed either as <a href="/docs/languages-sdks/python/#inputs-and-outputs">argument classes or as dictionary literals</a>.
</p>
</pulumi-choosable>

The ReplicationConfigurationTemplate resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="associatedefaultsecuritygroup_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#associatedefaultsecuritygroup_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Associate<wbr>Default<wbr>Security<wbr>Group</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to associate the default Elastic Disaster Recovery Security group with the Replication Configuration Template.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="bandwidththrottling_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#bandwidththrottling_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Bandwidth<wbr>Throttling</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Configure bandwidth throttling for the outbound data transfer rate of the Source Server in Mbps.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="createpublicip_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#createpublicip_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Create<wbr>Public<wbr>Ip</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to create a Public IP for the Recovery Instance by default.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="dataplanerouting_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#dataplanerouting_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Data<wbr>Plane<wbr>Routing</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Data plane routing mechanism that will be used for replication. Valid values are <code>PUBLIC_IP</code> and <code>PRIVATE_IP</code>.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="defaultlargestagingdisktype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#defaultlargestagingdisktype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Default<wbr>Large<wbr>Staging<wbr>Disk<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Staging Disk EBS volume type to be used during replication. Valid values are <code>GP2</code>, <code>GP3</code>, <code>ST1</code>, or <code>AUTO</code>.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="ebsencryption_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#ebsencryption_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Ebs<wbr>Encryption</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Type of EBS encryption to be used during replication. Valid values are <code>DEFAULT</code> and <code>CUSTOM</code>.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="replicationserverinstancetype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#replicationserverinstancetype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Replication<wbr>Server<wbr>Instance<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Instance type to be used for the replication server.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="replicationserverssecuritygroupsids_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#replicationserverssecuritygroupsids_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Replication<wbr>Servers<wbr>Security<wbr>Groups<wbr>Ids</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Security group IDs that will be used by the replication server.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="stagingareasubnetid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#stagingareasubnetid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Staging<wbr>Area<wbr>Subnet<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Subnet to be used by the replication staging area.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="stagingareatags_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#stagingareatags_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Staging<wbr>Area<wbr>Tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Set of tags to be associated with all resources created in the replication staging area: EC2 replication server, EBS volumes, EBS snapshots, etc.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="usededicatedreplicationserver_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#usededicatedreplicationserver_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Use<wbr>Dedicated<wbr>Replication<wbr>Server</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Whether to use a dedicated Replication Server in the replication staging area.</p>
<p>The following arguments are optional:</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="autoreplicatenewdisks_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#autoreplicatenewdisks_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Auto<wbr>Replicate<wbr>New<wbr>Disks</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to allow the AWS replication agent to automatically replicate newly added disks.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="ebsencryptionkeyarn_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#ebsencryptionkeyarn_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Ebs<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Key<wbr>Arn</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ARN of the EBS encryption key to be used during replication.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

            title="Optional">

    <dd>Whether to associate the default Elastic Disaster Recovery Security group with the Replication Configuration Template.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="bandwidththrottling_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#bandwidththrottling_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">bandwidth<wbr>Throttling</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Configure bandwidth throttling for the outbound data transfer rate of the Source Server in Mbps.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="createpublicip_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#createpublicip_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">create<wbr>Public<wbr>Ip</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to create a Public IP for the Recovery Instance by default.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="dataplanerouting_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#dataplanerouting_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">data<wbr>Plane<wbr>Routing</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Data plane routing mechanism that will be used for replication. Valid values are <code>PUBLIC_IP</code> and <code>PRIVATE_IP</code>.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="defaultlargestagingdisktype_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#defaultlargestagingdisktype_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">default<wbr>Large<wbr>Staging<wbr>Disk<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Staging Disk EBS volume type to be used during replication. Valid values are <code>GP2</code>, <code>GP3</code>, <code>ST1</code>, or <code>AUTO</code>.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="ebsencryption_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#ebsencryption_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">ebs<wbr>Encryption</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Type of EBS encryption to be used during replication. Valid values are <code>DEFAULT</code> and <code>CUSTOM</code>.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="replicationserverinstancetype_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#replicationserverinstancetype_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">replication<wbr>Server<wbr>Instance<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Instance type to be used for the replication server.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="replicationserverssecuritygroupsids_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#replicationserverssecuritygroupsids_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">replication<wbr>Servers<wbr>Security<wbr>Groups<wbr>Ids</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Security group IDs that will be used by the replication server.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="stagingareasubnetid_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#stagingareasubnetid_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">staging<wbr>Area<wbr>Subnet<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Subnet to be used by the replication staging area.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="stagingareatags_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#stagingareatags_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">staging<wbr>Area<wbr>Tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Map&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Set of tags to be associated with all resources created in the replication staging area: EC2 replication server, EBS volumes, EBS snapshots, etc.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="usededicatedreplicationserver_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#usededicatedreplicationserver_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">use<wbr>Dedicated<wbr>Replication<wbr>Server</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>

</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>

</span>

The following state arguments are supported:


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_arn_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_arn_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Arn</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Replication configuration template ARN.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_associatedefaultsecuritygroup_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_associatedefaultsecuritygroup_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Associate<wbr>Default<wbr>Security<wbr>Group</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to associate the default Elastic Disaster Recovery Security group with the Replication Configuration Template.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_autoreplicatenewdisks_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_autoreplicatenewdisks_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Auto<wbr>Replicate<wbr>New<wbr>Disks</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to allow the AWS replication agent to automatically replicate newly added disks.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_bandwidththrottling_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_bandwidththrottling_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Bandwidth<wbr>Throttling</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Configure bandwidth throttling for the outbound data transfer rate of the Source Server in Mbps.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_createpublicip_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_createpublicip_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Create<wbr>Public<wbr>Ip</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to create a Public IP for the Recovery Instance by default.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_dataplanerouting_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_dataplanerouting_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Data<wbr>Plane<wbr>Routing</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Data plane routing mechanism that will be used for replication. Valid values are <code>PUBLIC_IP</code> and <code>PRIVATE_IP</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_defaultlargestagingdisktype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_defaultlargestagingdisktype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Default<wbr>Large<wbr>Staging<wbr>Disk<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Staging Disk EBS volume type to be used during replication. Valid values are <code>GP2</code>, <code>GP3</code>, <code>ST1</code>, or <code>AUTO</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_ebsencryption_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_ebsencryption_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Ebs<wbr>Encryption</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Type of EBS encryption to be used during replication. Valid values are <code>DEFAULT</code> and <code>CUSTOM</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_ebsencryptionkeyarn_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_ebsencryptionkeyarn_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Ebs<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Key<wbr>Arn</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ARN of the EBS encryption key to be used during replication.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_pitpolicies_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_pitpolicies_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Pit<wbr>Policies</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#replicationconfigurationtemplatepitpolicy">List&lt;Replication<wbr>Configuration<wbr>Template<wbr>Pit<wbr>Policy&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Configuration block for Point in time (PIT) policy to manage snapshots taken during replication. See below.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_replicationserverinstancetype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_replicationserverinstancetype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Replication<wbr>Server<wbr>Instance<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Instance type to be used for the replication server.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_replicationserverssecuritygroupsids_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_replicationserverssecuritygroupsids_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Replication<wbr>Servers<wbr>Security<wbr>Groups<wbr>Ids</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Security group IDs that will be used by the replication server.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_stagingareasubnetid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_stagingareasubnetid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Staging<wbr>Area<wbr>Subnet<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Subnet to be used by the replication staging area.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_stagingareatags_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_stagingareatags_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Staging<wbr>Area<wbr>Tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Set of tags to be associated with all resources created in the replication staging area: EC2 replication server, EBS volumes, EBS snapshots, etc.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tags_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_tags_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Set of tags to be associated with the Replication Configuration Template resource.</dd><dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span id="state_tagsall_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_tagsall_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tags<wbr>All</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider <code>default_tags</code> configuration block.<p class="property-message">Deprecated: Please use <code>tags</code> instead.</p></dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_timeouts_csharp">

        <span class="property-type"><a href="#replicationconfigurationtemplatetimeouts">Replication<wbr>Configuration<wbr>Template<wbr>Timeouts</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_usededicatedreplicationserver_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Whether to use a dedicated Replication Server in the replication staging area.</p>

## Import



Using `pulumi import`, import DRS Replication Configuration Template using the `id`. For example:

```sh
$ pulumi import aws:drs/replicationConfigurationTemplate:ReplicationConfigurationTemplate example templateid
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).
